attributes.action: set in motion the return of the Chronicles of Man to the Manx people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these are a record of our culture and myths that is held in the british museum, they belong to the manx nation and should be returned to us. this issue should be seen in the same light as that which is felt by the greek nation and the elgin marbles. we want them back, they where stolen.
